page.title: 17Notable Events-Gloucester
page.content: In Spring we have a circus.This is usually a big success,it is enjoyed by many people.People sometimes follow it to Gloucester to watch it.In Summer we have a{Carnival.People prepare and anticipate it for many weeks.They watch it going through the City Centre where all traffic is stopped for about 4 hrs.There are floats,local bands, fancy dress and money is given for charity.At the same time we have in Gloucester Park a big fair. In August we have the{3 Choirs {Festival}at our Cathedral.This is an international event.It has been taking place for over 300 yrs and occurs every 3 years in Gloucester.The other years it takes place in Hereford and Worcester. In recent years we have had a {Marathon}around the City Centre.
